title: rito brokee
body:
Happening to me now on OCE, every game loads 7% and stays like that.. stuck on load screen but can hear the game being played by rest of team; pings, kills/deaths etcetc
Even in custom matches this occurs.. no amount of relogging fixes it
riot fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

I'd also recommend ensuring your [video card drivers are up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2).
